title: Feature Request : ZeroPad3d
body_html:
I am using 2 x 2 (even filter size) window convolutions in 3D and hence require asymmetric padding to maintain 'same' input and output shapes.
In torch.nn module, I can only see ZeroPad2d padding layer.
Can you please add ZeroPad3d layer ?
Also, can you suggest any other way to achieve asymmetric padding in 3D?
